scripts.start:auth: cross-env NODE_ENV=development MONGO_URI=mongodb://127.0.0.1:27017/cryptonote JWT_SECRET=dev_jwt_secret_32chars_min PORT=3001 node server-auth.js
scripts.dev:auth: cross-env NODE_ENV=development MONGO_URI=mongodb://127.0.0.1:27017/cryptonote JWT_SECRET=dev_jwt_secret_32chars_min PORT=3001 nodemon server-auth.js
